images.caption: Figure 1:A word cloud illustrating the textual content of theLens[142]dataset. The frequent scene-specific terms suggest a diversity of daily scenarios, while directional terms (e.g.,turn right) highlight its capacity for evaluating spatial reasoning.

Figure 1:A word cloud illustrating the textual content of theLens[142]dataset. The frequent scene-specific terms suggest a diversity of daily scenarios, while directional terms (e.g.,turn right) highlight its capacity for evaluating spatial reasoning.

Figure 2:A word cloud of the ground truth answers ofAdsQA[84], where the domain-specific words such asnarrative,engagement, andstorytellingshowcase the specialized reasoning in the advertising videos.

Figure 3:Failure cases of Track #1 winner onLens.
Images are shown in their original proportions.
Figure 4:Failure cases of Track #2 winner onLens. Images are shown in their original proportions.
Figure 5:Failure cases of Gemini 2.5 Pro onAdsQA.

Figure 6:Samples of Track #3, demonstrating the key challenges in advertisement understanding,e.g., visual elements, persuasive strategies, core themes, emotional appeals, and target audience analysis.
